metadata.title: CVE-2022-48623 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The Cpanel::JSON::XS package before 4.33 for Perl performs out-of-boundsaccesses in a way that allows attackers to obtain sensitive information orcause a denial of service.

criterions.comment: libcpanel-json-xs-perl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
